law.catch_line: (a) The County Commissioners of Garrett County may enact ordinances regulating the height, size, loc...
law.text:
(a) The County Commissioners of Garrett County may enact ordinances regulating the height, size, location, and setback of an advertising sign adjacent to a State or county road in Garrett County.
An ordinance enacted under this section may not be less stringent than any applicable State or federal law.
